name: Most Excellent Sandwich
author: SAMSARAMOM
summary: This is a healthy melt in your mouth sandwich if you are tired of the traditions.  Whole wheat bread is served open face with cream cheese, tomatoes, alfalfa sprouts and mozzarella cheese, then baked to perfection. These are sure to impress the pickiest of eaters!
ingredients: ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, room temperature
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a cookie sheet with aluminum foil
Spread cream cheese onto each slice of bread, and set cheese side up on the cookie sheet
Place the tomato slices over the cream cheese
Top with alfalfa sprouts, then a generous sprinkle of mozzarella cheese
Bake for about 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until the cheese is melted, and sandwiches are warm
